General.Name: Helio SA
General.Description: Helio S.A. produces and markets packaged dried fruits and nuts in Poland. It offers nuts, dried and candied fruits, grains, poppy-seed fillings, fudge caramel masses, icings for cakes, and microwave popcorns. The company sells its products to retail chains, wholesalers, and grocery stores under the HELIO brand. Helio S.A. was founded in 1992 and is based in Zaborów, Poland. Helio S.A. operates as subsidiary of Agora S.A.
